name: cookiecutter-pytest-plugin
description: a cookiecutter to create pytest plugins with ease.

variables.name: full_name
variables.description: Please enter your full name. It will be displayed on the README file and used for the PyPI package definition.

variables.name: email
variables.description: Please enter an email address for the meta information in setup.py.

variables.name: plugin_name
variables.prompt: What should be the name for your plugin?
variables.description: Please enter a name for your plugin. We will prepend the name with 'pytest-'

variables.name: module_name
variables.prompt: Please enter a name for your base python module

variables.name: license
variables.description: Cookiecutter will add an according LICENSE file for you and set the according classifier in setup.py.

variables.name: docs
variables.prompt: Do you want to generate a base for docs?
variables.description: Would you like to generate documentation for your plugin? You will be able to choose from a number of generators.

variables.name: docs_tool
variables.prompt: Which tool do you want to choose for generating docs?
variables.description: There are a number of options for documentation generators. Please choose one. We will create a separate folder for you

variables.name: fixtures
variables.description: Please enter a valid JSON string to set up fixtures for your plugin.
